statements: SELECT * FROM educational_resources WHERE resource_type='Book';
SELECT resource_name, resource_url FROM educational_resources WHERE resource_type='Video' ORDER BY resource_name ASC;
SELECT resource_name, resource_description FROM educational_resources WHERE resource_type='Article' ORDER BY resource_name DESC;
SELECT resource_id, resource_name, resource_url FROM educational_resources WHERE resource_type='Podcast';
SELECT resource_name, resource_url, resource_description FROM educational_resources WHERE resource_type='Webinar' ORDER BY resource_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM educational_resources WHERE resource_type = 'Book'
SELECT resource_name, resource_url FROM educational_resources WHERE resource_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT resource_name, resource_type, resource_url FROM educational_resources WHERE resource_type = 'Article' ORDER BY resource_name DESC
SELECT * FROM educational_resources WHERE resource_type = 'Video' AND resource_url LIKE '%youtube%'
SELECT resource_name, resource_description FROM educational_resources WHERE resource_type = 'Podcast' AND resource_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY resource_name ASC
SELECT * FROM resources;
SELECT resource_id, resource_type, resource_name FROM resources;
SELECT resource_id, resource_name, upload_date FROM resources WHERE upload_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM resources WHERE resource_type = 'Document' ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT r.resource_id, r.resource_name, c.category_name FROM resources r JOIN categories c ON r.category_id = c.category_id WHERE c.parent_category_id IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM resources WHERE resource_type = 'document';
SELECT resource_name, source_link FROM resources WHERE upload_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT resource_name, source_link FROM resources WHERE resource_type = 'video' ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM categories WHERE parent_category_id IS NULL ORDER BY category_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_resources FROM resources;
SELECT title, description FROM LectureVideos;
SELECT * FROM LectureVideos WHERE duration > 30;
SELECT title, author, published_date FROM ReadingMaterials ORDER BY published_date DESC;
SELECT name, category, price FROM SimulationTools WHERE price < 1000 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM LectureVideos JOIN ReadingMaterials ON LectureVideos.video_id = ReadingMaterials.material_id;
SELECT * FROM LectureVideos WHERE duration > 30 ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT title, description, upload_date FROM LectureVideos WHERE title LIKE '%SQL%' ORDER BY upload_date ASC;
SELECT tool_id, name, category, price FROM SimulationTools WHERE price < 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM ReadingMaterials WHERE published_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY material_id;
SELECT title, author, published_date FROM ReadingMaterials WHERE author = 'John Doe' ORDER BY published_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM LectureVideos;
SELECT title, lecturer FROM LectureVideos WHERE lecturer = 'John Doe';
SELECT video_id, title, lecturer FROM LectureVideos WHERE video_id IN (1, 5, 10);
SELECT * FROM ReadingMaterials ORDER BY author DESC;
SELECT tool_name, description FROM SimulationTools WHERE tool_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM LectureVideos;
SELECT title, lecturer FROM LectureVideos ORDER BY lecturer DESC;
SELECT video_id, title, lecturer, video_url FROM LectureVideos WHERE lecturer='John Doe';
SELECT * FROM ReadingMaterials WHERE author='Jane Smith';
SELECT tool_name, description FROM SimulationTools ORDER BY tool_name;
SELECT * FROM lecture_videos;
SELECT video_title, video_description FROM lecture_videos WHERE uploaded_by='John';
SELECT material_title, material_type FROM reading_materials WHERE publication_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT tool_name, tool_description, supported_platforms FROM simulation_tools;
SELECT tag_name FROM resource_tags ORDER BY tag_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM lecture_videos;
SELECT video_title, video_description FROM lecture_videos WHERE uploaded_by = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM reading_materials WHERE publication_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT material_title, material_type FROM reading_materials WHERE material_topic = 'Science';
SELECT tool_name, tool_description FROM simulation_tools WHERE array_length(supported_platforms, 1) > 1;
